title: Python
content: Python is a very simple and readable language. I love to write code in Python.

title: Javascript
content: Javascript was my first programming language. I feel very comfortable when it comes to work with Javascript.

title: Django
content: It is very amazing framework. It is very handy, organized and Advance framework Therefore mostly I choose Django for writing backend.

title: React
content: The Creation of Facebook is very beautiful. It is a very good choice to write frontend of Web-App. I feel very comfortable with it.

title: MongoDb
content: MongoDb is a very powerful and easy to use. I mostly choose Mongo Db  over any other Database. I love it because of its Schema less nature

title: Html
content: I mostly used HTML for hacking (Just Kidding).

title: Css
content: I am also a backend developer but still i love to write styling in Css

title: Tailwind
content: A very beautify framework for css. It alway help me to do fast styling.

title: Chakra UI
content: Very beautify Js library for Styling. I love it due to its built in features

title: Redux Toolkit
content: Redux toolkit is very beautify library for state management.
